What is the consensus algorithm used by Verus and its PBaaS chains?
The consensus algorithm used by Verus and its PBaaS chains is a hybrid of 50% Proof of Work (PoW) and 50% Proof of Stake (PoS).

.
All these chains have the same consensus algorithm, 50% PoW, 50% PoS, so you can also stake an unlimited amount of PBaaS-chains.

.

.
